Var.Descr: Data block available for user data mapping

Var.Descr: Data block available for user data mapping - Retain DB

Var.Descr: System Modbus Master TCP communication status. It is a structure of type MBMTCPNODESTATUS composed ...

Var.Name: SYSALARMACTIVE
Var.Descr: At least one alarm is active (associated condition holds true)

Var.Name: SYSALARMWAITACK
Var.Descr: No alarm is active but at least one alarm is waiting for acknowledgement

VarI.Name: STR
VarI.Descr: The address of a STRING in which to put the received data

VarI.Name: LEN
VarI.Descr: The max of characters of the string. The size of the string as indicated in the declaration of the STRING variable is the max size that can be indicated.

VarI.Name: TERM
VarI.Descr: The address of a STRING in which to put the termination character

VarI.Name: TMO
VarI.Descr: Timeout in ms specified for current function

VarO.Name: HASTERM
VarO.Descr: true if the string has the terminator char

Var.Name: TIMSTART
Var.Descr: Time value at start of counting

Var.Name: CUEDGE
Var.Descr: True whenever a posedge on CU is detected

Var.Descr: True whenever a posedge on CD is detected

VarI.Name: PORT_DEV
VarI.Descr: The name of the port device (eg: /dev/ttyUSB0)

VarI.Name: BAUDRATE
VarI.Descr: One of the SERIAL_BAUDRATE supported values

VarI.Name: PARITY
VarI.Descr: One of the SERIAL_PARITY supported values

VarI.Name: BYTESIZE
VarI.Descr: One of the SERIAL_BYTESIZE supported values

VarI.Name: STOPBITS
VarI.Descr: One of the SERIAL_STOPBITS supported values

VarI.Name: OPEN
VarI.Descr: If TRUE open the COM port with the values passed as parameters and the other default options.

VarI.Name: VALUE
VarI.Descr: Value depends on the option specified

VarI.Name: BUFF
VarI.Descr: The address of the TX buffer. Address can be retrieved using ADR operator

VarI.Name: LEN
VarI.Descr: The number of bytes to send

VarI.Name: BUFF
VarI.Descr: The address of the array of BYTE in which to put the received data. Address can be retrieved using ADR operator

VarI.Name: LEN
VarI.Descr: The number of BYTEs to receive

VarI.Name: BUFF
VarI.Descr: The address of the array of BYTE in which to put the received data. Address can be retrieved using ADR operator

VarI.Name: LEN
VarI.Descr: The number of BYTEs to receive

VarI.Name: TMO
VarI.Descr: Timeout in ms specified for current function

VarI.Name: VAL
VarI.Descr: The address of the BYTE in which to put the received data. Address is retrieved using ADR operator

VarI.Name: VAL
VarI.Descr: The address of the BYTE in which to put the received data

VarI.Name: TMO
VarI.Descr: Timeout in ms for the current function only

VarI.Name: NODE
VarI.Descr: The index of the node in the network

VarI.Name: ACK
VarI.Descr: Type of alarm acknowledgement (manual or auto)

VarI.Name: LEVEL
VarI.Descr: Alarm level (the lower the value the higher the alarm priority)

VarI.Name: ADDRESS
VarI.Descr: Physical address of the variable of type BOOL representing the alarm condition status (if TRUE, alarm is active)

VarI.Name: GROUPID
VarI.Descr: Alarm priority value by which query result has to be filtered

VarI.Name: LEVEL
VarI.Descr: Alarm priority value by which query result has to be filtered

VarI.Name: SIZE
VarI.Descr: Number of elements in the window

VarI.Name: ENABLE
VarI.Descr: If TRUE, alarm log is enabled; it is disabled, otherwise

VarI.Name: CODE
VarI.Descr: Alarm code by which query result has to be filtered

VarI.Name: GROUPID
VarI.Descr: Alarm group ID by which query result has to be filtered

VarI.Name: SIZE
VarI.Descr: Number of elements in the window

Var.Name: ACTIVE
Var.Descr: Indicate if node is active on network

Var.Name: MISSCNT
Var.Descr: Number of Task Timed cycles with Slave failure

Var.Name: NETSTAT
Var.Descr: Status of the node in the network
